author: feedback@businessinsider.com (Isaac Scher), Isaac Scher
title: The coronavirus 'will stalk the human race for a long time to come,' WHO envoy says
description: Laurent Gillieron/AP Photo/KEYSTONE Dr. David Nabarro, a special envoy to the World Health Organization's coronavirus team, said that the outbreak will linger in the coming months. His warning is at odds with the hopes of President Donald Trump and other offi…
content: The novel coronavirus pandemic will not be over any time soon, according to Dr. David Nabarro, a special envoy to the World Health Organization. In an interview with NBC's "Meet the Press," he warned of long-term social and economic impacts, even as President… [+2758 chars]
